00037 #include "egs_box.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"

00040 void EGS_Box::printInfo() const {
00041     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00042     egsInformation(" box size = %g %g %g\n",ax,ay,az);
00043     egsInformation("=======================================================\n");
00044 }
00045 
00046 string EGS_Box::type("EGS_Box");
00047 
00048 static char EGS_BOX_LOCAL ebox_message1[] = "createGeometry(box): %s\n";
00049 static char EGS_BOX_LOCAL ebox_message2[] = "null input?";
00050 static char EGS_BOX_LOCAL ebox_message3[] = "wrong/missing 'box size' input?";
00051 static char EGS_BOX_LOCAL ebox_message4[] =
00052     "expecting 1 or 3 float inputs for 'box size'";
00053 static char EGS_BOX_LOCAL ebox_key1[] = "box size";
00054 
00055 extern "C" {
00056 
00057     EGS_BOX_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry *createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00058         if (!input) {
00059             egsWarning(ebox_message1,ebox_message2);
00060             return 0;
00061         }
00062         vector<EGS_Float> s;
00063         int err = input->getInput(ebox_key1,s);
00064         if (err) {
00065             egsWarning(ebox_message1,ebox_message3);
00066             return 0;
00067         }
00068         EGS_AffineTransform *t = EGS_AffineTransform::getTransformation(input);
00069         EGS_Box *result;
00070         if (s.size() == 1) {
00071             result = new EGS_Box(s[0],t);
00072         }
00073         else if (s.size() == 3) {
00074             result = new EGS_Box(s[0],s[1],s[2],t);
00075         }
00076         else {
00077             egsWarning(ebox_message1,ebox_message4);
00078             if (t) {
00079                 delete t;
00080             }
00081             return 0;
00082         }
00083         if (t) {
00084             delete t;
00085         }
00086         result->setName(input);
00087         result->setMedia(input);
00088         result->setLabels(input);
00089         return result;
00090     }
00091 
00092 }
